Cursos Disponíveis
Curso {{ course.name }} Categoria {{ course.category }}
import { CoursesService } from './../service/courses.service'; import { Course } from './../model/course'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses', templateUrl: './courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses.component.scss'] }) export class CoursesComponent implements OnInit{ courses: Course[] = [ { _id: '1', name: 'Angular', category: 'front-end'} ]; displayedColumns = ['name','category'] coursesService: CoursesService; constructor(private httpClient: HttpClient) { // this courses = []; // this.coursesService = new CoursesService(); this.courses = this.coursesService.list(); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
